name: Spinner 3D - Hundreds of Virtual Fidget Spinners
name_original: Spinner 3D - Hundreds of Virtual Fidget Spinners
description:
Fidget spinners are the new craze! Stress relief, fun, tricks? Why buy one?

Download and get the experience of changing their colors, borders and centers.

How play:
- Drag finger over screen for move spinner
- Tap Shuffle button for change spinner
- Tap left or right for activate spinner

Check out how real this spinner looks.

This game has lots of fun options, control it with your finger and live the experience.
